text: Eugenio Ravignani (10 December 1932 - 7 May 2020) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. Ravignani was born in Italy and was ordained to the priesthood in 1955. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Vittorio Veneto, Italy, from 1983 to 1997 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Trieste, Italy, from 1997 to 2009.Diocese of Trieste ==Notes== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Eugenio Ravignani
